channel.title: Rune mtp torva help
channel.description:
Hello moparscape.
I have a problem to what most 614/634 rsps's have.
I downloaded R.u.n.e mtP by marcbob. I need help fixing the torva armour, because there is purple/ white stuff on the shoulder Picture to prove it [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1668843/torva.png[/img]
What files do I go to and what codes to change? (I think this is a bad texture)
Any help would be useful on how to fix this.
Thanks.

item.title: Rune mtp torva help
item.dc:creator: @coolguy12123 coolguy12123
item.description:
@coolguy12123 wrote:

AtomicInt_:

Use the 659 client that… someone released, Google it.

Yea, Im probably going to use project dungeonfest/dungeoneering to take the texture. But still, where can I find textures, and how can I change them?

Read full topic

Use the 659 client that… someone released, Google it.

item.dc:creator: @coolguy12123 coolguy12123

@coolguy12123 wrote:

Is it fixable. Can u tell me on what file is the torva platebody saved so that I can rip it off another server and add the texture to this server.

item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Lol, the torva plate, is not a ‘image’ it’s a model and a texture, which marc said above is corrupt.

item.title: Rune mtp torva help
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“coolguy12123, post:10, topic:415557”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=517497.msg3760306#msg3760306 date=1316811965]
Bitch you stole my pic.

http://google.com/runescape-development/rs2-client/help/346827-634-torva-platebody.html
[/quote]

Ok Fridder. You need to calm yourself. I needed that picture to bring up an example of what the purple stuff look like.
Please do not rage about a picture. I dont want to start to have haters come across me, so dont become my enemy (Trust me)

Sorry for any inconvenience, bro.

:/[/quote]

I’m not raging lol, just say it’s my pic. I took that pic not you D:
Something so pointless still needs credits

Read full topic
